title: Goldman Revamps Tech Banking Group as AI Infrastructure Booms
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is reorganizing some of its technology, media and telecom investment-banking group as the artificial intelligence industry — and all the infrastructure that serves that business — takes off.

title: AI that predicts sequences within antibodies could lead to new therapeutic treatments
description: A new artificial intelligence model could help design antibodies that better protect the body against viruses and disease. The AI model, known as ImmunoMatch, can predict and identify correct protein pairings within antibodies, potentially helping to strengthen the immune system. The research was conducted by a team from the University of Surrey and University College London and is published in Nature Methods.

title: AI 'Humanity's Most Powerful Force', Says Google DeepMind Executive
description: Manish Gupta, senior director of Google DeepMind, on Tuesday said that artificial intelligence has emerged as humanity's most powerful force for progress, adding that its evolution will pave way for big shifts, accelerate scientific discovery, and augment human capabilities. Google — the architect of AI models, including Gemini and Gemma that are integrated for search enhancements, cloud services, and enterprise tools — Tuesday announced funding support to India's AI Centers of Excellence

title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Updated to Make Images Better and Faster
description: OpenAI is rolling out an update to ChatGPT that’s intended to generate images better and faster, the latest move by the artificial intelligence developer to bolster its flagship chatbot amid heated competition from Alphabet Inc.’s Google. The new version of ChatGPT Images, announced on Thursday, is designed to make and edit images more precisely, as well as to spit out pictures as much as four times faster than its previous AI image-generation model. title: US Navy Claims AI Cut 160-Hour Job Down To 10 Minutes
description: Artificial Intelligence is being used by more people every day; and the U.S. Navy says a ChatGPT-like tool helped it drastically reduce how long some jobs take.

title: 'Real concerns' over AI and cognitive decline in children, teaching union boss warns
description: "What does artificial intelligence mean for teaching and learning over the long term?" Mr Kebede asked
content:

title: 'Psychological Safety' A Key Factor In AI Initiatives For 83% Business Leaders, Says Infosys-MIT Report
description: The success or failure of Artificial Intelligence (AI) initiatives largely hinges on psychological safety, according to 83% of business leaders surveyed in a report by Infosys and MIT Technology Review Insights. The study highlights that fear of failure and backlash, unclear communication about AI, and weak leadership — despite robust technical infrastructure — are major barriers to psychological safety.
